com.vtls.opensource.image
Class ImageIOImageSource

java.lang.Object
  com.vtls.opensource.image.ImageIOImageSource
All Implemented Interfaces:
ImageSource
public class ImageIOImageSource
extends Object
implements ImageSource

This class gets a BufferedImage using the ImageIO to read different image sources.
